name: Grippy Golf
description:
Grippy Golf is a speedrunning 3D platformer where objects stick to the ball. Launch yourself across the course, collecting an ever-growing cluster of objects as you aim for a hole in one!

Maintain Your Momentum

Boost from one powerup to the next to finish each level in a single stroke.

Stick to Anything

Cones, trees, houses... Increase your mass to gather bigger objects.

Master the Course

Test your cleverness and skill by completing bonus objectives and competing on the leaderboard.

Unlock Strange Items

Acquire new golf balls, like... a hairbrush? A golf club??
